short_summary: Blast cabinet to replace the outdated and damaged blast cabinet
description: Brand new blast cabinet and media recovery system to be installed on the shop floor.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement 
#### Reference Number
WS3909945298

#### Solicitation Number
WS3909945298

#### Publication Date
10 March, 2023

#### Tender Closing Date
20 April, 2023, 14:00 hours Eastern Daylight Time (EDT). Please disregard Ariba Discovery and CanadaBuys posting response deadline closing times.

#### Amendment Date
06 April, 2023

#### Expected Contract Start Date
03 April, 2023

#### Expected Contract End Date
02 April, 2024

#### Contracting Authority
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
 Email: [judy.holt@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:judy.holt@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) 

### Tender Description
The Department of National Defence is seeking a contractor to supply, deliver, and install a new blast cabinet and media recovery system at CESF / 86 Airfield Systems & Utilities (ASU), 8 Wing Trenton, 8 St Jean Ave, Bldg 291, Astra, ON, K0K 3W0. The system will replace the current outdated and damaged blast cabinet. 
Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
Tendering Procedures: All interested suppliers may submit a bid.
Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

### Solicitation Procedure
* Request for Proposal (RFP)
* Competitive - Open Bidding
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Tender status: Expiré (Expired) 

### Trade Agreement
The tender is covered under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

### Notice Website
http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15659722?extsite=MTU2NTk3MjJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

### Product Description
Metal cutting machinery and accessories (UNSPSC: 23240000)

---

### Contract Award Information
* Procurement Category: Goods (GD)
* GSIN: None
* GSIN Description: None

### About This Purchase
The Contracting Authority requires a contractor to deliver a new blast cabinet and media recovery system for the Department of National Defence. The system will replace the current outdated and damaged blast cabinet. The system is required to
